CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The calculated saturation hole mobilities ( μ h ) for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP are 2.7 × 10^-2 and 8.9 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , respectively , with high on / off ratios ( > 10^5 ) and low threshold voltages ( < 20 V ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PTATDPP (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
2. PTAFDPP (Poly(3,4-alkylthiophene))

These are the names of the materials being studied in the paragraph, which are types of conducting polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PTATDPP
2. PTAFDPP

These are the names of the materials being studied in the paragraph, which are types of conducting polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The calculated saturation hole mobilities ( μ h ) for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP are 2.7 × 10^-2 and 8.9 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , respectively , with high on / off ratios ( > 10^5 ) and low threshold voltages ( < 20 V ).

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. μh - the hole mobility of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP, which is a physical property of the materials.
2. on/off ratios - the ratio of the mobility of holes in the "on" state to the mobility of holes in the "off" state, which is a measure of the material's ability to switch between two states.
3. threshold voltages - the voltage at which the material's conductivity changes from one state to another, which is a measure of the material's electrical properties.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are μh, on/off ratios, and threshold voltages.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. μh - the hole mobility of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP, which is a measure of the material's electrical conductivity.
2. on/off ratios - the ratio of the mobility of holes in the "on" state to the mobility of holes in the "off" state, which is a measure of the material's ability to switch between two states.

Therefore, the only entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are μh and on/off ratios.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| μh |
| on/off ratios |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
